name: Vertical Notification Bar
author: umarbajwa

sections.description:
Notification bar plugin offers simple and user friendly user interface. Customizable bar with important features which most of the bar plugins do not offer.
Responsive , zero coding skills, fulfill your needs.

No premium version plugin is completely free.

Features

  • Vertical bars/boxes.
  • 5 Different positions.
  • Fully customizable.
  • Provides easy and simple user interface.
  • Responsive/Fluid.
  • Allow you to make your custom bar.
  • Design your own bar according to your theme.
  • Most important features included.
  • Premium features included.

<a href=”http://www.web-settler.com” >Check my other plugins

Still under development suggestions are most welcomed.
sections.installation: • Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: vertical bar,announcement box,vertical box, Donate Link : http://wpscrolltotop.blogspot.com/ Requires at least:2.2 Tested up to :3.9.
